nodes.text: The Starbirth Lounge was a lounge room that was situated on Deck 56 of the Nessem Shipyards, a space station that was located near to the planet Nessem. During the time of the Galactic Civil War, the jizz band Hova Mensk and the Blurtones played at a concert that was held in the Starbirth Lounge. The event was attended by the Trandoshan mercenary Ssorku and while he watched the band, he was confronted by a team of Rebel Alliance agents that sought to obtain a set of starship component schematics that Ssorku had stolen.
